title: [ISSUE #3806] add multi-topic batch api for producer
body:
**Make sure set the target branch to `develop`**

## What is the purpose of the change

Add a new batch producer api that allow multiple topics in one batch.  the new api support both Master-Slave and Dledger Mode.  This New API is already run on our production environment for several months in Master-Slave Mode.

## Brief changelog

SendMessageRequestHeader add two fields:
bool multiTopic, denote that the request is multi-batch when true.
string queueIds, denote that the queueId for each topic. , e.g. "1,9" for two different topics.
string topic, the original topic field is encode to represent the topics in the batch request. e.g. "topicA%%topicB" for two topics.

If the batch message's topics does not have a shared broker, MQClientException will be thrown.

body:
**Make sure set the target branch to `develop`**

## What is the purpose of the change

#3781 When the producer sends a message successfully, the thread pool is newFixedThreadPool. The cache queue is unbounded and large concurrency causes memory overflow.

## Brief changelog

The custom thread pool sets the bounded queue length to 50000

close #3781

body:
**Make sure set the target branch to `develop`**

## What is the purpose of the change

Correct min logic offset for BCQ.

## Brief changelog

title: [ISSUE #3679] Support topic attributes
body:
**Make sure set the target branch to `develop`**

## What is the purpose of the change

Link #3679 
En: As RocketMQ grows, topics will have more traits. Adding a well-designed Attributes sheet can greatly improve TopicConfig's description capabilities.
For example, whether the ConsumeQueue type of a Topic is BatchCQ or SimpleCQ, whether the Deletion strategy of a Topic is Delete or Compact, and even the topi-level preservation time are all attributes of a Topic. Adding TopicConfig variables endlessly is obviously not an elegant approach.

Ch: 随着RocketMQ的发展，现有的TopicConfig在一定程度上已经没有办法表达清楚一个Topic真实的特质。增加一个设计精良的Attributes属性表可以极大程度提高TopicConfig的描述能力。
比如，一个Topic的ConsumeQueue类型是BatchCQ还是SimpleCQ，一个Topic的Deletion策略是Delete还是Compact，甚至Topic级别的保存时间等，都是属于Topic的一个Attribute，无休止得增加TopicConfig变量显然不是一个优雅的做法。

title: [RIP-28] light message queue(LMQ)
body:
## Brief changelog
#3666 Support light message queue (LMQ) multi-consumeQueue atomic dispatch, at the same time support LMQ metaData and offset management

Some messaging scenarios require light message queue, Such as MQTT multi-level topic or AMQP lightweight queue can be set at will by users when sending and subscription message. Therefore, the implementation of LMQ's queue model is required

1. Implement multi-dimensional dispatch of a message based on ConsumeQueue, and a message can support multiple lightweight queue consumption.
2. Implement multi-level topic management, so topic metadata also needs adaptation management, such as topic verification, data cleaning and so on.
3. Implement lightweight queue consumption offset management

- Add factoryIndex to ensure that the instances between processes do not conflict and solve the problem of clientId conflicts in the container. (Remove the time stamp method, which is not conducive to instance reuse)
- Add groupCode to solve the problem of creating instance conflicts with the same subscription group in the process.
- Add namesrvCode to solve the problem of creating instance conflicts with different namesrv addresses in the process.
- Add unit test.
